item.description:
On Monday nights Heritage Farm Ice Cream puts on FREE concerts across the street at The Sampas pavilion. They also sponsor a classic car show (begins at 6pm) -cars from days gone by.

Bring a chair or blanket ( and bug repellent) for the concert while the sun sets over the Merrimack River. Heritage It's a great night out!

 

*We will meetup at Heritage Farm - at the porch. I will have a meetup.com pin (or sign). Then, we can walk across to the Sampas Pavillion for the concert. I will remit my cell number to all 'yes' RSVP the day prior, in the event you may be late. You can purchase something from their menu, ice cream, or beverage.... or bring your own. www.heritageicecream.com. This is a shared event with other meetup groups.

WHERE THIS IS AN ALL-OUTDOOR EVENT, RAIN CANCELS. I will update as close to 6pm in the event the weather is questionable.

 THE MIGHTY BAD HABITS:

New England Music Award blues/ R&B/ soul act of the year nominee

The Mighty Bad Habits continue to soar to new heights playing rock & roll, funk, and the blues in it's purest form. The Mighty Bad Habits have proven that the blues, and rock & roll are alive and here to stay.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meetup at Heritage- at the porch.Then, walk across for the concert. Please read info below for details
item.name: FREE Outdoor Concert On The River: THE MIGHTY BAD HABITS
